title: club problems?
body: I'm the owner of the club fzn, when i look at the clubs it doesn't show that I'm in it and it doesn't say fzn when i hover my name either. can you help please

replies.body: There's been some problems with clubs since it was restored after a period of [downtime](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016).  The issues are being investigated, and our clubs team is working on solutions.  Hang tight until then!
